name: Brooke Turney
text: We had a great time at a birthday party here! We did not know this place existed until we got the party invitation. What a great place! The owner and her daughter were very kind and patient with a bunch of little kids!!! They made sure everyone got to ride the horses, multiple times! And they had goats that the kids got to feed and play with! The answered everyone's question about the animals with knowledge and grace. We had a great time and have been telling all our friends about this place!

name: Erin Adkinson
text: My daughter did a horse camp here. She had the best time! The grounds are beautiful abd the owner is fantastic!

name: Makenna Woollen
text: this place is amazing.i ride here and it has taught me so much,there horses are well trained and they work hard every day to keep the stables clean.,and the trainers are nice and fun,they never doubt anyone and teach us well.definitley a place to take your child to lessons.it is also amazing grounds and everything is perfect for a stbles like this

name: Sandra Ferguson
text: Horses were healthy and happy a nice clean stable

name: Rachel Phillips
text: Lake Forest Stables is a great place for trail rides as well as riding lessons.  They keep the classes small so you can get more one on one help with your technique.  The ladies here take such great care of the horses and really do work hard to help you learn anything and everything you could want to know about horseback.  They also hold Birthday Parties!!!

name: Abby Evans
text: I keep my horse here and am good friends with all the people who board here!!! Definitely recommend and it’s a great place to have your children learn how to ride!!

name: Brandy Crist
text: Terrific place to ride horses. Staff is very knowledgeable and nice. The rabbits and goats are so fun for smaller kids. Definitely a place to check out

name: Ray Weinshenker
text: Heaven on Earth

name: Amie Wright
text: Very caring owners!

name: English Farms
text: This horse stable has been around a long time. Mrs Hughart is one of the nicest people I know. A real horse wisperer. Older stables horses receive a lot of attention. Lots of separate areas for them to graze. Always someone there to look after everything.

name: Molly Mazur
text: Nice and welcoming stables. Owner and teaching staff knowledgeable patient and kind. Very clean with healthy happy horses. Looking forward to more lessons.

name: Jennifer Stewart
text: This is a wonderful teaching crew. They took their time teaching my daughter who is a beginner rider.

name: Cristine Pyle
text: Finally a lesson barn that teaches riding from the ground up. My daughter loves working with the TWS horses, as well as, bringing her own horse in for lessons. The instructors are awesome and ensure students can work with horses safely and skillfully before advancing them to the next level or discipline. My daughter is learning the skills she needs to succeed as an English and/or Western rider at a pace that allows her to mature and grow as an equestrian.

resp.text: Thank you Cristine! We love your daughter and are so proud of her progress!

name: Jackie Harwood
text: We went to Twin Lakes Stable and fell in love with the place. Even though it is under construction you can see how gorgeous the place will be when it is done. We loved Hannah and she is extremely knowledgeable. Great place for anyone to ride! We would recommend her to anyone!

name: Kristi Briggs
text: Love Twin lakes Stable! We drive an hour weekly for our daughters lessons.  We have dealt with anxiety, trust and ptsd, and couldn't get our daughter near a horse before!! The very first introductory lesson had our daughter up and riding. Highly-qualified, personable and family oriented staff and facility.

resp.text: Thank you Kristi! We are so proud of how far your daughter has come in such a short time!

name: Ellen Pylka
text: My 6 year old daughter has been riding horses here for a year now. She has a great time. The horses are very well trained. Staff is wonderful. We have had a lot of fun this year! We travel from Madison once a week for lessons. It is well worth the drive.

name: Currie Carbonel
text: Beautiful place wonderful people.

name: Sharon Heinz (Profit Wise Accounting)
text: Beautiful horses, knowledgeable instructors, beautiful barn.

name: Kelsey Trump
text: Beautiful location! Great place to board a horse, very nice arena and beautiful barn with many amenities!

name: Bethany Claxton
text: We love Seven Oaks and our wonderful trainer, Annie.

name: Sara Whitchurch
text: Great place! If you are looking for Horse boarding or Riding Lessons This is the place to go!

name: Stephanie Lynn
text: Beautiful

name: Rebecca Walker-Jones
text: Wonderful horseback riding in a fabulous location!

name: michael driver
text: It really does appear that they love what they do!

name: Ellie Tyesha
text: Beautiful place!!

name: Mary Davis
text: This is the place to learn how to ride. Dawn has been wonderful in helping my daughter reach her potential.

name: Michael Davis
text: Great people working here. They really care about their horses and students.

name: Raymond Trehern
text: Used also as therapy for veterans

name: BOBBI WINFIELD-GAINEY
text: Awesome place!!

name: Chris Downer
text: Wonderful Experience

name: OSheaIrish Lassy
text: This lady has made herself a little goldmine and she knows it! The horses are very well taken care of, she took very nice pictures of my family, and it didn't cost an arm and a leg. I will definitely do it again and highly recommend any one who wants to broaden the equestrianism to visit this place!

name: Jason Fountain
text: Wonderful place to ride horses

name: Mikayla Mcleod
text: The instructed is awesome,mrs.toni I never want to leave and I always have a good time there we get to make our horses go fast when we are ready my horse is tia and she is fast.45  minutes goes by fast.the place is awesome.

name: Nichole Renauld
text: If you want to learn the right way about horses.

name: Driven Assembly (Christ is in Us)
text: Awesome place!

name: Diana Nides
text: My 4 year old loves his instructor Ms. Maggie and pony Mystic!

name: Tracy Fischer
text: this a great experience for my grand baby

name: cindy goodrum
text: Wonderful trainers. Love their horses. Granddaughter loves the riding lessons.

name: Nicholas Imsand
text: I may be biased. But this is a wonderful place that has been doing great work for 20+ years. You will never find a more loving and caring staff and Mrs. Leah knows her stuff!

name: Caroline Tash
text: Great atmosphere. I have been taking lessons for five years now! Great experience for beginning riders to experienced riders! You should consider OAK MEADOWS, for your child of any age.great for little kids to adults of any age.

name: Ed Hardy
text: Awesome

name: Bai Bai
text: Starting lessons for my daughter! The owner is so nice!! Genuine and so homey!! Thumbs up!!

name: Tammy Barber
text: Patient instructors. Reasonably priced! Love the people!

name: Robert Good
text: Friendly atmosphere and knowledgeable training.
